casebody.data:
Claudia PUFF
v.
Gregory PUFF Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 3, 2018

Edward M. Kweskin, in support of the petition.

Samuel V. Schoonmaker IV, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 177 Conn. App. 103, 171 A.3d 1076 (2017), is granted, limited to the following issue:

"Did the Appellate Court properly reverse the trial court's judgment of contempt?"
